item.title: 单元测试
item.description: 有什么好的被测试函数？ 测试代码的组织 平铺模式 xUnit家族模式 测试函数 testing.AllocsPerRun testing.CoverMode testing.Coverage testing.Init testing.Main testing.Register testing.RunBenchmarks testing.RunExamples testing.RunTests testing.Short testing.Verbose testing.T.Log testing.T.Logf testing.T.Error testing.T.Errorf testing.T.Fatal testing.T.Fatalf testing.T.Fail testing.T.FailNow testing.T.Failed testing.T.Parallel testing.T.Run testing.T.Skip testing.T.SkipNow testing.T.Skipf testing.T.Skipped testing.T.TempDir testing.T.Name testing.T.Cleanup testing.T.Deadline testing.T.Setenv testing.T.Helper testing.TB.Log testing.TB.Logf testing.TB.Error
